salaryFormula.description: Regional baseline adjusted by cost-of-living pressure

graduateMethodology._verificationNote: Regional totals (officialStem, coreICT) are official DGEEC NUTS II figures (2023/24). City-level officialStem and coreICT values are proportional estimates derived from these regional totals, distributed by institutional size. These are marked approximate=true and prefixed with ≈ in the UI. digitalStemPlus is an internal benchmark estimate and is marked approximate in the UI.

digitalStemPlus.description: Hiring-relevant talent pool: STEM + CTeSP + Adjacent programs

coreICT.description: Pure CS/IT specialists (subset of Tech STEM+)

source.provider: Proportional estimate from DGEEC regional total
source.methodology: City share of regional DGEEC total, distributed proportionally by institutional size
internal benchmark estimate
(coreICT / digitalStemPlus) × 100
(coreICT / officialStem) × 100

source.provider: Proportional estimate from DGEEC regional total
source.methodology: City share of regional DGEEC total, distributed proportionally by institutional size
IT-convergence-compressed INE baseline + COL adjustment
Semi-automated extraction from live Idealista listings; quality offices in central locations (60-300 m2); HITL validation before publication.
Semi-automated extraction from live Idealista listings; 1-bedroom modern apartments in central areas (40-60 m2); HITL validation before publication.

source.note: New York = 100. Where direct Numbeo data was unavailable, Numbeo-style estimates were derived from regional cost patterns and AI fact-checked.
